page.title: 18CLUBS
page.content: In our area there are several clubs for children. The{Y.M.C.A.}and the{Boys' Club} are two clubs which are for boys and girls. These clubs are situated in the middle of two housing areas. Both clubs have games, which include judo, tennis, pool and football. Members can also go on trips, at home and abroad. There are also exchange visits with foreign Y.M.C.A. clubs. Both clubs have leaders, who try to look after you, although some shout at you and tell you off. It can be good to go to these clubs, to enjoy these activities, and to get out of the house for a little while.
